decl.description:
`furo-ui5-money-input`
Binds a entityObject field google.type.Money to a furo-number-input and currency dropdown fields
 <sample-furo-ui5-money-input></sample-furo-ui5-money-input>

 you can set currencies dropdown with options in meta or set options attribute as json in element or set currencies as string in element. the three
 ways have priority : currencies > options as attribute > options in meta. When no currencies is setted. Default currency will be `CHF`

 <furo-ui5-money-input autofocus ƒ-bind-data="--entity(*.furo_data_money_input)" options='{"list": [ "CHF","EUR","USD" ]}'></furo-ui5-money-input>
 <furo-ui5-money-input autofocus ƒ-bind-data="--entity(*.furo_data_money_input)" options='{"list": [ {"id":"CHF","label":"Schweiz"},{"id":"EUR","label":"Europa", "selected": true}'></furo-ui5-money-input>
 <furo-ui5-money-input autofocus ƒ-bind-data="--entity(*.furo_data_money_input)" currencies="CHF,EUR,USD"></furo-ui5-money-input>

## supported meta and constraints
- **readonly: true** , set the element to readonly
- **required: true** , set the element to required

Tags: money input
decl.name: FuroUi5MoneyInput

members.name: bindData
members.description: Binds a fieldNode. Make sure the type of your field is accepted by the implemented component.

members.name: readAttributes
members.description:
Reads the attributes which are set on the component dom.
Attributes that can be se are   `required`,`readonly`,`disabled` ,
Use this after manual or scripted update of the attributes.

members.name: onFnaReadonlyChanged
members.description: overwrite onFnaReadonlyChanged function

members.name: onFnaConstraintsChanged
members.description: overwrite onFnaConstraintsChanged function

members.name: _updateField
members.description:
update amount field
One issue with number inputs is that their step size is 1 by default.
If you try to enter a number with a decimal (such as "1.0"), it will be considered invalid.
If you want to enter a value that requires decimals, you'll need to reflect this in the step value
(e.g. step="0.01" to allow decimals to two decimal places).

members.name: onFnaFieldNodeBecameInvalid
members.description: overwrite onFnaFieldNodeBecameInvalid function

members.name: onFnaFieldNodeBecameValid
members.description: overwrite onFnaFieldNodeBecameValid function

members.name: options
members.description:
the option object defines the currencies dropdown
'{"list": [ "chf","eur","usd" ]}'
'{"list": [ {"id":"CHF","label":"Schweiz"},{"id":"EUR","label":"Europa", "selected": true}'

members.name: setOptions
members.description: set options for currencies dropdown

members.name: currencies
members.description: the string list of currencies for the dropdown. e.g. "CHF,EUR,USD"

members.name: injectEntities
members.description: inject the currency entities for dropdown

members.name: _privilegedAttributes
disabled
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user.

members.name: readonly
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

events.description: Fired when the input operation has finished by pressing Enter or on focusout.
events.name: value-changed

attributes.name: currencies
attributes.description: the string list of currencies for the dropdown. e.g. "CHF,EUR,USD"

attributes.name: options
attributes.description:
the option object defines the currencies dropdown
'{"list": [ "chf","eur","usd" ]}'
'{"list": [ {"id":"CHF","label":"Schweiz"},{"id":"EUR","label":"Europa", "selected": true}'

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

decl.summary: Binds a entityObject field google.type.Money to a number-input and currency dropdown fields

pkg.name: @furo/ui5
pkg.description: SAP UI5 Web Components data bindings for furo

scripts.docs:generate: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:typerenderer && ./scripts/cem.sh
